__e: I can't believe that family is throwing Pete to the wolves, again.
Uh, we are in the midst of an active investigation into exactly what caused this morning's lion attack.
Someday I'll have an apartment of my own... in a house with a pair ofstone lions guarding the gate.
You have rescued me from the mouth of lions, and I will declare your name to my brothers.
I can't allow you to be fed to the lions and not do anything.
